transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingCustomers
DerivedColumn1, Select2 join(Select1@CustomerID == StreamingCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Select3 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
StreamingCustomers select(mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
MapDrifted1 derive(CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate, "mm-dd-YYYY")) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 derive(AddressID = toString(byName('AddressID')),
		CustomerID = toString(byName('CustomerID')),
		AddressLine1 = toString(byName('AddressLine1')),
		AddressLine2 = toString(byName('AddressLine2')),
		City = toString(byName('City')),
		State = toString(byName('State')),
		ZipCode = toString(byName('ZipCode')),
		CreatedDate = toDate(byName('CreatedDate')),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(byName('UpdatedDate'))) ~> MapDrifted1
SalesCustomers select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = DerivedColumn1@CreatedDate,
		CreatedDate = Select1@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = Select1@UpdatedDate,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID = Select2@AddressID,
		CustomerID = Select2@CustomerID,
		AddressLine1 = Select2@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = Select2@AddressLine2,
		City = Select2@City,
		State = Select2@State,
		ZipCode = Select2@ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = Select2@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = Select2@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
